name: Naomi Johnson
title: President
bio: Naomi Johnson is currently a research assistant in the HCI and AML labs at BYU. She is double majoring in computer science and Japanese. After graduating in 2020, she wants to get her doctorate and become a CS professor.

name: Nathan Geronimo
title: Vice President/Coordinator
bio: Nathan is a junior in the Computer Science program. He started programming once he switched from being a chemistry major back in 2015, and he never regrets the switch. He loves music, anime, and of course learning about how technology is evolving.

name: Alex Boswell
title: Chief Networking Officer
bio: Alex is a junior in the Computer Science major with a minor in Mathematics. His interests are of iOS and Android development and material design. He currently works on campus at BYU for the McKay School of Education on the MSEDEV team.

name: Vance Lee
title: Chief Social Media Officer
bio: Pursuing a Bachelors in Computer Science, a minor in Business Management, and a Language Certificate in Portuguese. Vance loves rock climbing, cooking, sudoku, and deep discussions about questions that don't have answers. He works as a Quality Assurance Engineer, but is fascinated by Artificial Intelligence.

name: Sierra Davis
title: Marketing Officer
bio: Sierra Davis is studying Computer Science with an Animation emphasis. She loves the outdoors, music, prank wars, watermelon, and creating cool things. She is a huge BYU fan and goes to way too many sporting events. Her dream is to create amazing procedural special effects for blockbuster action films or video games.

name: Kate Casperson
title: Chief Financial Officer
bio: Kate is a junior in the Computer Science major. She comes from the small town of Walla Walla, WA. Her hobbies include long-distance running with her husband, reading, piano playing, and trying out new recipes. As the finance officer in ACM she hopes to impact BYUâ€™s campus by helping students find their place in the tech world and feel included in the programs we have here.

name: Alyssa Haroldsen
title: Chief Technology Officer
bio: Alyssa is a senior in the Computer Science major with minors in Mathematics and Physics. Her interests are computer security, data analytics, and performance analysis. She enjoys television, videogames, and keeping up with Hacker News. She wants to join industry and change the world.

name: Corey Woodfield
title: Technology Officer
bio: Corey is a senior in computer science with minors in math and logic. He enjoys learning the theory behind computer science, and hopes to use machine learning to make the world a better place. He also hopes that computer science will help him fund his addiction to board games.

name: Frank Jones, PhD
title: Faculty Sponsor
bio: Dr. Jones received his B.S. and M.S. degrees in Computer Science from University of Idaho, investigating investigating high-performance architectures and compilers. He then received a Ph.D. at University of Colorado Boulder, additionally focusing on wearable computing and assistive technology. Prior to joining the Computer Science faculty at BYU, he spent time revitalizing the College of Idaho CS curriculum and working with the Naval Air Systems Command (NAVAIR) at China Lake California.
